level.heading: DENIAL, SUSPENSION, OR REVOCATION OF LICENSE (§ 21-717)

level.text: Failure to permit the inspections required by this chapter shall be grounds for denial of an application for a solid waste collector’s license.
Continued or repeated failure to comply with any of the provisions of this chapter shall be grounds for suspension or revocation of a solid waste collector’s license.
A licensee shall be given an opportunity to answer and be heard by the Director upon charges against the licensee.
